function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of inter-institutional collaboration","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate economic and social impact management","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Weak community-based crisis risk management","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of inter-sectoral collaboration and government agreements for covid-19 control policies","category":"Government","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of community participation in disease prevention and management","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of stakeholder engagement in combating covid-19","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate consultation of vulnerable populations in planning and response","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Intellectual property rights and affordability","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inequitable distribution of disease load among vulnerable populations","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of post-crisis reconstruction and recovery","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequacies in global governance structure","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Governance efficiency and quality being put to the test during the pandemic.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruption of global education and lack of distance-learning solutions","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Severe impact of socio-economic and financial impacts on vulnerable households","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Deepened pre-existing inequalities in access to health services and social protection","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of pandemic on informal sector workers and migrant workers","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased incidence of suicide among vulnerable populations","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Health inequalities due to existing social stratification and resource sharing","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Emerging issues related to jobs and income of millions of people, social safety net, future of income support schemes, the burden on women, and the plight of migrants and informal sector workers","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of access to resources and sudden disappearance of informal sectors of employment","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of pandemics on human life and the global economy","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium"}]}
